#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int gcd(int x,int y)
{
	if(x==0)
	return y;
	if(y==0)
	return x;
	if(x==y)
	return x;
	else
	return gcd(y,x%y);
}
int main()
{
	int t,a,b,n,x;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d%d%d",&a,&b,&n);
		x=gcd(a,b);
		//printf("x=%d\n",x);
		if((n%x==0)&&(n<=a||n<=b))
		printf("YES\n");
		else
		printf("NO\n");
	}
}
